name: account-lead-lookup
description: CDT website's Account Lead Lookup tool

scripts.start: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd .env.dev parcel index.html -p 3000 --https
scripts.start:prod: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd .env.prod parcel index.html -p 3000 --https
scripts.build: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd .env.dev parcel build index.html && npm run remove-hash
scripts.build:prod: cross-env npm run clean && env-cmd .env.prod parcel build index.html && npm run remove-hash

author: BPA
